turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, today I need your help finding some coffee to get to buy from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I'm looking to get a iced cafe americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get it a grande.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I'd like to get 2% milk added, as well as extra cinnamon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, this drink typically doesn't come with milk, would you still like to add milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I think I like to add a little bit of milk, yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can add that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to be in Downtown Houston.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me check the address on that store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is this the one on dallas street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I believe it is, yes. It should be It should be over there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your order to that location, one moment please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you an iced americano with 2% milk and some cinnamon added to be picked up at the starbucks on dallas street in houston, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. That's pretty much all the help that I needed today, and I'm glad you could help me with that, so thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I hope that I do, and I hope you enjoy the rest of your day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you.
